text: the recent form updates are very much appreciated. Here is one more small update you could make that would make creating "floating labels" easier:  Add an active class to the `div.hs-form-field` when an input is focused or is not empty - see my codepen for an example: <https://codepen.io/stefen/pen/wybOYy> thanks all!

y’know, I actually think you might be able to do labels like that without needing the class. haven’t tried, but I  remember doing something similar a long time ago, I just detected focus on the wrapper element instead or something like that.
your suggestion would make it easier though.
Thanks guys! I'll share with the team and see what they think :+1:
can we add a "move" button to the file details in file manager?
I find it useful as sometimes i want to move files to a folder but cant remember the name so i browse while this window is open
